positions.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Led backend development for POS PADI, a mobile and web platform enhancing operations and trust for POS agents across Nigeria and Africa.
Architected core infrastructure to ensure system scalability, data security, and real-time performance.
•Collaborated with frontend and product teams to integrate API endpoints and authentication flows.

positions.title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed MyNeeds, an end-to-end e-commerce platform enabling seamless shopping, secure payments, and real-time inventory updates.
Engineered backend functionalities for product management, user authentication, and personalized recommendations
Created dynamic frontend interfaces with React and Tailwind CSS, improving UX and mobile responsiveness.

positions.title: Junior Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Contributed to student-led tech projects with a focus on UI development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
